sentiment_articles.title: Amazon Slashes Beats Studio Pro Headphones by Over 50% to Clear Out Stock
sentiment_articles.summary: You can score these over-the-ear headphones for 51% off if you act quickly.

sentiment_articles.title: This 27″ Acer 120Hz Monitor Is 30% Cheaper Than Black Friday, Amazon Is Clearing Its Stock
sentiment_articles.summary: For around $100, you get a very good 27-inch gaming monitor.

sentiment_articles.title: Trump says Jeff Bezos 'solved the problem' after White House attacks Amazon on tariff price labeling plan
sentiment_articles.summary: The White House is hitting back at Amazon over reports that it will show the impact of tariffs on prices of products it sells through its e-commerce store.

sentiment_articles.title: Most Best Buys will have extra Switch 2 stock on launch day
sentiment_articles.summary: If you don’t have a Nintendo Switch 2 preorder, Best Buy might still be able to help you get a console on launch day. For the retailer’s midnight openings for the Switch 2 launch, “most stores will have limited inventory of systems, games, and accessories for…

sentiment_articles.title: Didn’t Preorder a Switch 2? You May Have Luck Getting One After Launch
sentiment_articles.summary: Retailers like Best Buy and GameStop promise they'll have Nintendo Switch 2 in-store stock.
